title: Paolo Rossi - Canzonacce TQMP
description:
Ok, let's take a break from all that jazz don't you jazzers worry, there's still a lot to up here

Warning
Here is one for the Italians only. Not for the reasons of the language only. Paolo Rossi is an actor, song author and a satirist, so one have to know a great deal about Italian daily life, politics and sports and the connection between to understand all the "subtones" in his lyrics. This one is from 1993, so I guess it might not be even for all Italians...
And yes, my grandparents were from Italy, so I was spending a lot of time there during the summer vacations every year...Italian became my second mother language...and Paolo Rossi one of my favourite performers!

Paolo Rossi (Monfalcone, 22 giugno 1953) ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨ un attore, cantautore e comico italiano.
Si trasferisce a Ferrara dove vive l'adolescenza e si diploma in perito chimico, ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨ Milanese d'adozione, Paolo Rossi spazia da trent'anni dai club ai grandi palcoscenici, dal teatro tradizionale al cabaret, dalla televisione al tendone da circo: ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨ caratterizzato dal suo personale modo di "fare spettacolo" che, pur immergendosi appieno nelle tematiche dell'oggi, non prescinde mai dall'insegnamento dei classici antichi e moderni, da Shakespeare a MoliÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨re a Bertolt Brecht, alla amatissima commedia dell'Arte.

Canzonacce e fatto nel suo stile, ironico, allegro e divertentissimo !
Buon ascolto!

Brought to you by TQMP. (The Quality Music Project)

In this project we, fellow pirates share only quality items out of our CD collections in lossless FLAC and include covers, especially for those who like to burn and print and put it in a nice and shiny jewelcase. Well, you all know the drill :)
